text: Ginásio Paulo Sarasate is an indoor sporting arena located in Fortaleza, Brazil. The capacity of the arena is 10,000 spectators and opened in 1971. It hosts indoor sporting events such as basketball and volleyball, and also hosts concerts. ==External links== *Arena information Category:Indoor arenas in Brazil Category:Sports venues in Ceará Category:Basketball venues in Brazil
title: Ginásio Paulo Sarasate
